net.philsprojects.net
Class ClientListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  net.philsprojects.net.ClientListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientListener
public class ClientListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientListener

A basic ClientListener which prints all events out to stdout.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

onClientOpen

public boolean onClientOpen(Client client)
An event that occurs directly following the acceptance of a socket, opening of a channel, or connecting of a socket. This should return whether the client should be processed further or rejected.

Specified by:
onClientOpen in interface ClientListener
Parameters:
client - The client to initialize.
